credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Peasant Man Smoking a Pipe
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: Rectangular, featuring slide-off cover with figure of peasant man in soft cap, long coat, trousers, bare feet, smoking pipe, rendered in dark and light woods with black enamel line drawing, framed in light wood. Sides feature wood mosaic decoration. Large piece of sandpaper adhered to bottom for striker.
name: Matchsafe
